com.observability.monitoring.server

Class NotificationEMail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.observability.monitoring.server.NotificationEMail

  • public class NotificationEMail
extends java.lang.Object
    NotificationEMail is a class that can send emails through a predefined SMTP server.
    1. Using Gmail as SMTP server: smtp.gmail.com
    2. Sending account: observabilityalert@gmail.com< (Pass: obscmusei)br> 3. Secure connection: TLS

    Author:
    Ying (Joel) Gao

    History:
    1. Created Jun 07 2015
